name: Animates
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

They’re cute, they’re cuddly, colorful and fun… they’re the Animates!



Raise your very own Animate from a small baby hatchling to a full-grown, mature Animate. Make sure that your new friend is both healthy and happy by playing with it, feeding it, training it and more. If you’re up for a challenge, raise multiple Animates all at once…

Only you know what’s best for your new friend and if you don’t, make sure that you pay close attention to the signs that it gives you!

  • 5 adorable and distinct Animates from which to choose from! Control 1 or 5 all at once!
  • A fascinating and delightful fairytale world that is sure to capture the imagination of young minds.
  • Collect prestigious rewards and trophies while you challenge your new friends with amazing activities.
  • Includes 5 additional and exciting bonus games: Fish-o-Matic, Hopscotch, Mole-o-Matic, Balloon Shooting and Find the Tweet-Tweet!
